comment: A pretty good professor overall. His test really make you utilize all the knowledge gained over the series of lectures (not cumulative). Usually gets bombarded with questions at the end of class but answers all before leaving. Knowledgeable on the tools used. Laid back personality but a hardworker

For Rapid Design Emert was laid back. The assignments do stack up if their not done or printed out right the first time. The class is more interesting than other Engineering classes because you are actually making and using tools of the industry. There is also a research paper that he requires but other than that its a straight forward class.
Great professor, I've taken him for Graphics 1, Machining and welding, and CNC and metrology. I'll sign up for his class every chance I get.

Great professor. Created the class to introduce rapid prototyping and other manufacturing techniques to students. Brought a wealth of industry knowledge to the class and even projects for companies that paid money. Great teach and asset to SPSU.
he is an awesome teacher. very helpful and understanding. the class is demanding and hard, but he is the best teacher for the job
Demanding, but you will learn a lot.  Projects are aggressive, but he stayed with us in the lab late many nights to help us finish.  I'd take him again.

He assigns ambitious projects, maybe a bit to ambitious based on available tools and time, but he stayed til after midnight with us in the lab more than once to help us get done.  Good teacher, you will learn a lot.  First B I ever got, but I did learn from him.
